Performs add and subtract operations involving a {{tt|time_point}}.

@1,2@ Applies the offset {{c|d}} to {{c|pt}}. Effectively returns {{c|CT(pt.time_since_epoch() + d)}}, where {{tt|CT}} is the return type.

@3@ Applies the offset {{c|d}} to {{c|pt}} in negative direction. Effectively returns {{c|CT(pt.time_since_epoch() - d)}}, where {{tt|CT}} is the return type.

@4@ Computes the difference between {{c|pt_lhs}} and {{c|pt_rhs}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|pt|a time point to apply the offset to}}
{{par|d|a time offset}}
{{par|pt_lhs, pt_rhs|time points to extract difference from}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
@1-3@ The time point that resulted from applying the offset {{c|d}}.

@4@ The duration between the time points.
